name: react-storefront-moov-xdn
description: Extension for running React Storefront apps on Moovweb's XDN platform.
author: Moovweb

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist; cp .npmrc dist; NODE_ENV=production babel src --source-maps --out-dir dist && cp package.json dist
scripts.link: yarn build; cd dist; npm link; yarn link; cd ..;
